
\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{multirow}
\usepackage{supertabular}

\begin{document}

\newcounter{utterance}

\twocolumn

{ \footnotesize  \setcounter{utterance}{1}
\setlength{\tabcolsep}{0pt}
\begin{supertabular}{c@{$\;$}|p{.15\linewidth}@{}p{.15\linewidth}p{.15\linewidth}p{.15\linewidth}p{.15\linewidth}p{.15\linewidth}}

    \# & $\;$A & \multicolumn{4}{c}{Game Master} & $\;\:$B\\
    \hline 

    \theutterance \stepcounter{utterance}  

    & & \multicolumn{4}{p{0.6\linewidth}}{\cellcolor[rgb]{0.9,0.9,0.9}{%
	\makecell[{{p{\linewidth}}}]{% 
	  \tt {\tiny [A$\langle$GM]}  
	 I really love the album called Lilith. I want to introduce it to my friend Luheng. Draft an email for it. Add a postscript to your response that starts with P.S. 
	  } 
	   } 
	   } 
	 & \\ 
 

    \theutterance \stepcounter{utterance}  

    & \multicolumn{4}{p{0.6\linewidth}}{\cellcolor[rgb]{0.8,1,0.9}{%
	\makecell[{{p{\linewidth}}}]{% 
	  \tt {\tiny [A$\rangle$GM]}  
	 Subject: You have to listen to 'Lilith' by Lana Del Rey\\ \tt \\ \tt Dear Luheng,\\ \tt \\ \tt I've been thinking about introducing you to some amazing music lately, and I immediately thought of the album 'Lilith' by Lana Del Rey. I know you have great taste in music, and I think you'll really appreciate the dreamy, atmospheric soundscapes and Lana's haunting vocals on this album.\\ \tt \\ \tt 'Lilith' is a bit of a departure from Lana's more well-known work, with a focus on folk and psychedelic elements. The album is a beautiful, ethereal journey that explores themes of love, loss, and the supernatural. I think you'll find it to be a really immersive and captivating listen.\\ \tt \\ \tt I'd love to hear what you think of it! Let me know if you end up giving it a listen and what you make of it.\\ \tt \\ \tt Best,\\ \tt [Your Name]\\ \tt \\ \tt P.S. I've included a link to the album on Spotify below, so you can easily give it a listen. https://open.spotify. 
	  } 
	   } 
	   } 
	 & & \\ 
 

    \theutterance \stepcounter{utterance}  

    & & & \multicolumn{2}{p{0.3\linewidth}}{\cellcolor[rgb]{0.95,0.95,0.95}{%
	\makecell[{{p{\linewidth}}}]{% 
	  \tt {\tiny [GM$|$GM]}  
	 {'detectable_content:postscript': {'postscript_marker': 'P.S.'}} 
	  } 
	   } 
	   } 
	 & & \\ 
 

    \theutterance \stepcounter{utterance}  

    & & & \multicolumn{2}{p{0.3\linewidth}}{\cellcolor[rgb]{0.95,0.95,0.95}{%

	  } 
	   }
